column2: BRIEF-Boston Properties Files For Offering Of Up To 1.27 Mln Shares Of Common Stock May 22 (Reuters) - Boston Properties Inc: * BOSTON PROPERTIES - FILES FOR OFFERING OF UP TO 1.27 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK IN DIVIDEND REINVESTMENT AND STOCK PURCHASE PLAN Source: (bit.ly/2LRtH4L) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Boston Properties Files For Common Stock Offering Of Upto $600.0 Mln May 22 (Reuters) - Boston Properties Inc: * BOSTON PROPERTIES INC FILES FOR COMMON STOCK OFFERING OF UPTO $600.0 MILLION - SEC FILING Source: (bit.ly/36ojF4s) Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Boston Properties Q1 FFO Per Share $1.49 April 24 (Reuters) - Boston Properties Inc: * COMPANY UPDATED ITS GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2018 EPS AND FFO PER SHARE * PROJECTED EPS (DILUTED) FOR 2018 OF $3.28 - $3.37 PER SHARE * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.88, REVENUE VIEW $2.66 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $6.32 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
